items.title: Digital Rights Management Market worth $11.05 billion by 2030 | MarketsandMarkets™
items.description: According to MarketsandMarkets™, the Digital Rights Management Market is estimated to be USD 6.72 billion in 2025 and is projected to reach USD 11.05 billion by 2030, registering a CAGR of 10.5% during 2025–2030.
